org.transitime.core

Class BlocksInfo

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.transitime.core.BlocksInfo

  • public class BlocksInfo
extends java.lang.Object
    Contains information on Blocks as a whole, such as which blocks are currently active.
    Author:
    SkiBu Smith

        public BlocksInfo()

    • Method Detail

      • getBlocksAboutToStart

        public static java.util.List<Block> getBlocksAboutToStart(int beforeStartTimeSecs)
        Looks at all blocks that are for the current service ID and returns list of ones that will start within beforeStartTimeSecs.
        Parameters:
        beforeStartTimeSecs - Specifies in seconds how much before the block start time that the block is considered to be active.
        Returns:
        blocks that are about to start. Can be empty list but will not be null.

      • getCurrentlyActiveBlocks

        public static java.util.List<Block> getCurrentlyActiveBlocks()
        Returns list of blocks that are currently active.
        Returns:
        List of currently active blocks. Will not be null.

      • getCurrentlyActiveBlocks

        public static java.util.List<Block> getCurrentlyActiveBlocks(java.util.Collection<java.lang.String> routeIds,
                                             int allowableBeforeTimeSecs)
        Returns list of blocks that are currently active for the specified routes.
        Parameters:
        routeIds - Collection of routes IDs that want blocks for
        allowableBeforeTimeSecs - How much before the block time the block is considered to be active
        Returns:
        List of currently active blocks. Will not be null.
